channel.title: Switch on Jefklaks Codex
channel.description: Recent content in Switch on Jefklaks Codex

item.title: 'Switch'-ing to the definitive nostalgic console
item.description: The Nintendo Switch has been on active duty here for longer than I can remember myself playing on any of my previous home consoles. Of course the Wii had it’s Virtual Console service where Nintendo forced you to pay another 5 EUR for NES, 8 EUR for SNES and 10 EUR for N64 games that were carefully, week by week, re-released. It must have been the fourth time I’ve bought the Legend of Zelda: a Link to the Past.
